about_the_game:
I'll make you an offer you can't refuse ! Have you ever thought about being part of the Mafia ? Well then, I present you Family Business an Indie game made by just one person ! So don't waste time come and be part of our Family that is growing every day ! Unless you want to sleep with the fish...Show me whos BOSS !



Family Business is a massive FPS that puts the player in a unique and comical universe set in the 1920's to the 1950's. Family Business offers the player the possibility to play multiplayer with other players or even play alone with bots! Play on different maps and game modes, eliminate your enemies, win matches, earn money, buy new weapons, improve your arsenal, customize your arsenal and go back to battle !

Family Business currently offers 3 different types of game modes :

  • Conquest
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Capture The Flag

And if that's not enough for you, I present to you...



Kill hordes and more hordes of zombies and try not to become breakfast for those bewitched ! Nobody knows for sure how it happened... But maybe you can discover the origin of this apocalypse... Be careful because Feilstrecker is watching you...



Family Business is in Early Access so there's a lot more to come. And if you want to stay informed and support the project, subscribe to our official channel as we make several Family Business announcements there !



If you want to send an email to: contato.familybusiness@gmail.com

Don't forget to give us your feedback and review our game as it helps us to improve a lot !

I wish you all a great game and good luck !

- Don

content_descriptors.notes: Mafia , organized crime , corruption , weapons , violence , blood , deaths , bad language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 2550K 3.4GHz / AMD FX 8120 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core-i7 3770 3.4GHz / AMD FX-8350 4.2GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
